name: PushNotificationConfig
summary: Simple object for specifying push notification options to registerForPushNotifications.

properties.name: callback
properties.summary: Callback function invoked upon receiving a new push notification.

properties.name: error
properties.summary: Callback function called when an error occurs during registration.

properties.name: success
properties.summary: Callback function called when the push registration is successfully completed.

properties.name: types
properties.summary: Array of NOTIFICATION_TYPE constants that the application would like to receive.
properties.description:
Setting the types property with the registerForPushNotifications method has no effect.

Use the registerUserNotificationSettings method to register the notification types to receive.
